2. Data: please also list your samples/materials, these are considered physical data
3. Ethics: will you use human cells? Please note that these are also considered human bodily material and to use these registration at UZL EC research, for more information see: www.kuleuven.be/english/research/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial. 
4. Metadata: you also mention some repositories that add metadata, PDB uses CIF and GEO/arrayexpress MINSEQE
7. Sharing: for data for which there is no suitable disciplinary repository you can also use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
